name: Echoes of Existence
description:
You play as an astronaut searching for a new planet suitable for humans. You are tasked with scanning the different aspects of the planet to find evidence that the planet is able to sustain human life. Complete scans and defend them from enemies while gaining experience and upgrading your weapon.

CONTROLS

Press/Hold WASD to move around the map.

Press/Hold LEFT-CLICK to shoot.

Press E to scan the flora when prompted.

Press ESC to pause the game.

View Source Code: https://github.com/jreinke428/gamejam
